name: @cyberfinity/www
description: Monorepo containing the packages that make up the www.cyberfinity.net website

scripts.clean: echo 'this used to do: lerna run clean'
scripts.build: echo 'this used to do: lerna run build'
scripts.start: echo 'this used to do: lerna run --parallel start'
scripts.test: echo 'this used to do: lerna run test'
scripts.lint: echo 'this used to do: lerna run lint'

author: James Nash (http://cirrus.twiddles.com/)
